title: IS there anyway to download leauge for unbuntu linux
body: My pc needds repaired so i have to use my old one for now and ive wanted to play leauge is there anyway i can do it on unbuntu linux{{champion:105}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: We don't officially support Linux at this time, but I do know some users on Reddit have been able to get it running on Linux. I can't fully endorse these methods as I can't be sure it won't hurt your system or that League will run properly, but it might be worth looking into.
